verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-Da-Vid[A Psalm] of David בַּֽיהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh In the LORD חָסִ֗יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti, put I my trust אֵ֭יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> to-me-Ru how say לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi; ye to my soul; נוּדוּ nu-du כנ֝֗וּדִי <S%H5110><s%> Nu-di, bemoan קהַרְכֶ֥ם <S%H2022><s%> har-Chem to your mountain צִפּֽוֹר׃ <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por. [as] a bird

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold הָרְשָׁעִ֡ים <S%H7563><s%> ha-re-sha-'Im For lo the wicked יִדְרְכ֬וּן <S%H1869><s%> yid-re-Chun bend קֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet, [their] bow כּוֹנְנ֣וּ <S%H3559><s%> kon-Nu they make ready חִצָּ֣ם <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzam their arrow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon יֶ֑תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Ye-ter; upon the string לִיר֥וֹת <S%H3384><s%> li-Rot shoot בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> be-mov- for אֹ֝֗פֶל <S%H652><s%> 'O-fel, darkness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> le-yish-rei- at the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. in heart

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki If הַ֭שָּׁתוֹת <S%H8356><s%> Hash-sha-tot If the foundations יֵֽהָרֵס֑וּן <S%H2040><s%> ye-ha-re-Sun; be destroyed צַ֝דִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik, what can the righteous מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What פָּעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> pa-'Al. do

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בְּֽהֵ֘יכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> be-Hei-Chal temple קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho, [is] in his holy יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD'S בַּשָּׁמַ֪יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim [is] in heaven כִּ֫סְא֥וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O throne עֵינָ֥יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav his eyes יֶחֱז֑וּ <S%H2372><s%> ye-che-Zu; behold עַפְעַפָּ֥יו <S%H6079><s%> 'af-'ap-Pav his eyelids יִ֝בְחֲנ֗וּ <S%H974><s%> yiv-cha-Nu, try בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צַדִּ֪יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik the righteous יִ֫בְחָ֥ן <S%H974><s%> yiv-Chan trieth וְ֭רָשָׁע <S%H7563><s%> Ve-ra-sho' but the wicked וְאֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> ve-'o-Hev and him that loveth חָמָ֑ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas; violence שָֽׂנְאָ֥ה <S%H8130><s%> sa-ne-'Ah hateth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho. his soul

יַמְטֵ֥ר <S%H4305><s%> yam-Ter he shall rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, Upon the wicked פַּ֫חִ֥ים <S%H6341><s%> pa-Chim snares אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire וְ֭גָפְרִית <S%H1614><s%> Ve-ga-fe-rit and brimstone וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach tempest זִלְעָפ֗וֹת <S%H2152><s%> zil-'a-Fot, and an horrible מְנָ֣ת <S%H4521><s%> me-Nat [this shall be] the portion כּוֹסָֽם׃ <S%H3563><s%> ko-Sam. of their cup

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik For the righteous יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD צְדָק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> tze-da-Kot righteousness אָהֵ֑ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev; loveth יָ֝שָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> ya-Shar, the upright יֶחֱז֥וּ <S%H2372><s%> ye-che-Zu doth behold פָנֵֽימוֹ׃ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-mov. his countenance
